name: Simon the Seahorse The Animated Adventure Game
name_original: Simon the Seahorse The Animated Adventure Game
description:
Travel to 13 Locations around the world! Face challenging obstacles! Hours of Fun Gameplay! Help Simon save his friends!!
Simon the Seahorse, the Animated Adventure Game is an exciting and fun game for all ages! Help Simon as he travels to 13 different locations around the world to save his friends, Sandy the Stingray and Salty the Sea Turtle! Face Challenging obstacles, a variety of enemies and different bosses on each level!

This game is a family friendly platform game with challenging sea creature enemies, collectible items, and different Sea Bosses at each level.
Each of the thirteen levels is a location from around the world. Each location is beautifully designed with colorful backdrops and is accompanied with amazing background music and sound effects. Locations are as follows: Australia, China, India, Turkey, Africa, Spain, England, Artic, Alaska, California, Mexico, Peru, and Egypt.

Players interact with the game using the computer's keyboard and mouse. As Simon progresses through the levels, he is awarded with items such as: more points, increased health, and abilities such as climbing, frequency (stun), sonar, and freeze. The special abilities that Simon gains enables him to stun, freeze, or temporarily immobilize his enemies. At the end of each level, there are special messages that take place between each Sea Boss and Simon. These messages are family friendly and contain good moral themes and important life lessons. Some examples are: Forgiveness, Friendship, Helping Others, and Faith.
